//note: Don't remove js-xxhash despite it being unused, so it's included in the license disclaimer

scripts.build: yarn licenses generate-disclaimer --silent --prod > static/disclaimer.txt && rm -rf dist pkg && wasm-pack build ../taglogic/ --out-dir ../web/pkg && webpack
scripts.start: yarn licenses generate-disclaimer --silent --prod > static/disclaimer.txt && rm -rf dist pkg && wasm-pack build ../taglogic/ --out-dir ../web/pkg && webpack serve --host 0.0.0.0
